title: Ep. 2 - Micro Cheating
description: On today's show, Todd, Pat, Nick, Digs, Ty, Boston Connor, Zito, and Evan talk about Serena Williams' spat with an official at the US Open, Elon Musk smoking a blunt with Joe Rogan, whether or not hitmen still exist, and how Texas educators are trying to teach kids to forget the Alamo. They also do a little fact or fiction, answer some listener questions, and dive into their phone notes. Don't forget to SUBSCRIBE, RATE, AND REVIEW. Come have a good time with us.
dc:creator: The Pod
